name: Getting Out of It - VR
description:
WARNING: give yourself enough space. You WILL hurt yourself if you don't.

A short VR experience I cobbled together in a few days for the GameDev.tv game jam.

You are stuck in a hole and have to use your VR hands to physically climb out, while slipping up and most likely falling to your death... It's okay though, you are immortal and can get right up, even if you break a bone or two.

v0.2:

- fixed random deaths when sliding off a wall

- jumping with both hands should be a bit more consistent now
